Biological Sciences.1: Demonstrate knowledge of the following subdisciplines: cell biology, organismal biology, genetics, ecology and evolution.
Biological Sciences.2: Demonstrate knowledge of laboratory methods used in each of the subdisciplines.
Biological Sciences.3: Interpret biological data sets from each of the subdisciplines.
Biological Sciences.4: Acquire a more in depth knowledge of one of the subdisciplines and complete an ACE 10 course in the subdiscipline area.
